thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Alteryx Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.09

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Alteryx Reports Q1 Loss Per Share Of $0.09
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Alteryx Inc:
* ALTERYX ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01
* Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.09 * Q1 REVENUE $42.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $39.8 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.10 TO $0.11
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.07 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 REVENUE IN RANGE OF $43.0 MILLION TO $44.0 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE IN RANGE OF $183.0 MILLION TO $186.0 MILLION
* Q2 REVENUE VIEW $41.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $179.4 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
